title: "Sutherland Springs" is a rumor-filled, trickster, conspiracy theory.
subtitle: A mass shooting at the Church of Texas on November 5, 2017 led to an avalanche of false information.
author: Brooke Binkowski
vclaim: We investigated a number of tricks, rumors and conspiracy theories associated with a mass shooting in Sutherland Springs, Texas, on November 5, 2017.
